definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The jailor brought up another livid prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 那個獄卒又帶來了一個面無人色的犯人。

sentences.english: His face turned ashen at the news.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這個消息他面無人色。

sentences.english: He flung out of the room white with anger and desperation .
sentences.chinese: 他拂袖而去，由於憤怒和絕望而面無人色。
